concurrent.label: Concurrent Search Limit
concurrent.description: The number of simultaneous connections that can be made between IBM Cloud Pakâ„¢ for Security and the data source.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

search_timeout.label: Query Search Timeout Limit
search_timeout.description: The limit on how long the query will run, in minutes, on the data source.

result_limit.label: Result Size Limit
result_limit.description: The maximum number of entries or objects that are returned by search query.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

time_range.label: Query Time Range
time_range.description: Time range for the search, in minutes, represented as last x minutes.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

timeout.label: Query Response Timeout Limit
timeout.description: The limit on how long to wait for the data source response, in seconds. Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

validate_pattern.label: STIX Pattern Validator
validate_pattern.description: Validate STIX patterns that needs to be translated into native data source query

mapping.label: Custom Mapping
mapping.description: Custom stix mapping if default mapping needs to be replaced

host.label: Management IP address or Hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or  hostname of the data source so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it

port.label: Host Port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the Host name or IP

help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the data source setting can be found in the specified link
